animal.question: I say "Moo!" and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am black and white sometimes.

animal.question: I say "Woof!" and love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 You can throw a ball for me.

animal.question: I say "Meow!" and like to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
😴 I like to nap in sunny spots.

animal.question: I waddle and say "Quack!". I like to swim. Who am I?

hints.text: 💧 I like to swim in a pond

animal.question: I hop around and have big ears. I love carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat orange vegetables.
🐾 I have long, strong feet for jumping.

animal.question: I swing from trees and like bananas. Who am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the biggest animal on land.
🚿 I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots on my body.
🌿 I like to eat leaves from the top of the tree

animal.question: I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?
I have black and white stripes. Who am I?

cosmos.question: I am big and bright in the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out when you wake up!

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and sometimes I'm round like a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I can be full or just a sliver.

cosmos.question: I twinkle and shine far away at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very, very small in the sky.
🌌 You can see many of me together.
🌠 I am made of hot gas.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live here! What am I?
I am a giant ball of gas that gives light and heat to Earth, what am I?

hints.text: 🌞 Without me, it would be dark and cold.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and I go around the Sun. I am like Earth, but I am not Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Astronauts might visit me one day.
🪐 I am one of many that go around the Sun.
🌎 I am a different kind of world.

cosmos.question: Sometimes you see me in the day with the sun, but I'm made of water. What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I am often white or gray.

cosmos.question: I am very far away, and made of many stars. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am bigger than a planet.
✨ I have lots of stars in me.
🌌 You can see many of me if you have a telescope.

cosmos.question: I fly high in space and help people talk to each other far away. What am I?

hints.text: 📺 You can watch TV because of me.

cosmos.question: I am a special car that can fly to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I can go to the moon.
